## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsuperregiterator">MCSuperRegIterator</a> enumerates all super-registers of Reg.

If IncludeSelf is set, Reg itself is included in the list.

Definition at line 590 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcregisterinfo-h">MCRegisterInfo.h</a>.
